Flying
[i]Engage![/i] – {1}{W}{B} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
[i]Dark Inferno[/i] – Whenever Camilla, Emblem of Revelation, engages or a creature you control with flying leaves the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. Each opponent loses life equal to that cards mana value. You may put that card into your graveyard.
